title: The Fall of Sky: Part Two
description: You can never go back. At least, that’s what they say…Liv and Audrey Westing have found something they’ve chased their entire lives, but could never quite reach. Love. It comes with the steepest of prices. One they both know they might not be able to pay, even with their hearts. Jonas wants more than Liv can give. Saul can’t watch Audrey save her sister anymore. Emilio, Saul’s brother, is hiding his own secrets buried deep inside. Secrets that are the difference between life and death… With the Jonas’ Cartel watching their every move, Liv and Audrey know there’s no place to run anymore. No place to hide. Maybe the fall is worth the pain… THIS IS A SERIAL NOVELLA SERIES! THIS IS PART TWO OF FOUR. BOOKS ARE RELEASED EVERY THREE WEEKS.
author: Alexia Purdy
